summary: Fixed React error #31 in BasicInformationForm.js by converting all helperText values to strings. Changed helperText from 'condition && error' pattern to 'condition && error ? String(error) : ""' for name, email, password, and confirm_password fields. This prevents React from trying to render error objects as children. Also removed unsupported onError prop from Popover components in previous fixes.
current_status: React error #31 fixed in BasicInformationForm helperText. All helperText values now safely converted to strings. Next.js rebuilt and restarted. Ready for testing Avatar click in header.
